info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN NORTHUMBERLAND... NORTHEASTERN SNYDER AND SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM EDT... At 327 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mifflinburg, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Sunbury, Lewisburg, Selinsgrove, Northumberland, Mifflinburg, Winfield, Shamokin Dam, Linntown, Hummels Wharf, Middleburg, Montandon, Kreamer, Port Trevorton, Penns Creek, Kratzerville, Vicksburg, Forest Hill, New Berlin, Freeburg and Snydertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
